app_descript:
SEQTA Engage

Brief: SEQTA Engage is an all-inclusive educational app designed to streamline communication and information management for families with children at SEQTA-affiliated schools. It offers secure, one-stop access to a student's educational journey, enabling parents to engage with their child's learning, assessments, and school life with ease and convenience.
